text: Made by Hand was a 1949-1951 British television series which aired on the BBC. According to listings in the Radio Times, it was a "series showing the work of British craftsmen."http://genome.ch.bbc.co.uk/schedules/bbctv/1949-12-01#at-22.15 It aired in a 15-minute time-slot. The series is likely lost, as very few telerecordings exist of pre-1953 BBC television. It was similar in premise to a pre-war series titled Craftsmen at Work. ==References== ==External links== *Made by Hand on IMDb Category:1940s British television series Category:1950s British television series Category:1949 British television series debuts Category:1951 British television series endings Category:Lost BBC episodes Category:British documentary television series Category:BBC Television shows Category:British live television series Category:Black-and-white British television shows
title: Made by Hand
